get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's profile

put.description: Update the currently authenticated user's profile

post.description: Complete the onboarding process for the current user

get.description: Get paginated list of questions with optional section filter
Get the next question for adaptive learning based on user's skill level and section
Get a single question with full details including correct answer and explanation

post.description: Record a student's answer attempt, check correctness, and calculate IRT theta update

get.description: Get attempt details with question and feedback information

put.description: Update the helpfulness rating for attempt feedback (thumbs up/down)

get.description: Get paginated list of study sessions for the current user

post.description: Start a new study session for the current user

get.description: Get details of a specific study session

put.description: End a study session and calculate duration/accuracy

get.description: Get overall readiness across all UTBK sections for the current user
Get detailed readiness for a specific UTBK section including subtype breakdown and trends

patch.description: Update target theta for a specific section

get.description: Get user's progress analytics including accuracy trend and section breakdown

post.description: Check the status of an async job (feedback generation, etc). Returns 200 for completed jobs, 202 for processing jobs.
